name: I Am Bad At People, But Turns Out I'm Even Worse At Making Games
name_original: I Am Bad At People, But Turns Out I'm Even Worse At Making Games
description:
A conversational Whack-A-Tentacle game. 

The game works as intended. I might not.

m3x6 font by Daniel Lissen

Music: cave by Aran Koning - Allergicraccoon
